Title: Tigers’ Buck Farmer ready to embrace whatever comes his way in A.J. Hinch’s bullpen
Description: Meeting (players) with a mask one is really hard,” said Tigers manager A.J. Hinch. “Buck Farmer, I’m not going to confuse for anybody.” Farmer’s beard has been trimmed, but his mullet remains, so it’s tough to miss him on the practice fields this week at the club’s Tiger Town facility.
Author: MLive
